transcript.title: No 797 - Appointment of New Deputy Chairman to Decimal Currency Board
transcript.content:
FOR PRESS - NoÂ 797Â 

The Acting Treasurer ( Mr. Holt) announced todayÂ the appointment of Sir Kenneth Coles as Deputy Chairman ofÂ the Decimal Currency Board in place of the late Sir AlfredÂ Armstrong, who had been Deputy Chairman of the Board from itsÂ establishment in June 1963 until his death last July.

Sir Kenneth has been a member of the Board sinceÂ its establishment and was also a member of the DecimalÂ Currency Committee.

CANBERRA,Â 
27th September, 1966Â
